attributes.action: Change the rule for pubs in tier 2 to help the ones without a kitchen
attributes.additional_details: Possibly limit the time people can be in the pub such as a 2 hour booked slot just so these pubs can open and stand a chance of surviving over what should have been a profitable time of the year.
attributes.background: We want the government to reassess the tier 2 restrictions on having to eat in a pub to aid pubs who are wet lead or without a kitchen... They have been observing social distancing, table service and cleanliness within their establishment. How are these types of pubs supposed to survive this??!!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561619
